    _RTObject.copy(_TXT T)
    text procedure copy(T); text T; if T =/= notext then begin text U; U.OBJ :- new TEXTOBJ(T.LENGTH,false); U.START := 1; U.LENGTH := T.LENGTH; U.POS := 1; U := T; copy :- U end copy;
